response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, I believe it would greatly benefit your operations. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special price of $12,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible deal while maximizing the return on investment for me. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can enhance your business. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 12000}
